infoMenu.expensesDesc: You can enter the payments you made during the day. Example; Grocery, food, etc.
infoMenu.revenueDesc: You can enter when you receive an income. Example; salary, investment etc.
infoMenu.goalDesc: Your financial goals. For example; buying a car, buying a house, etc.
infoMenu.donationDesc: Favors you do to your environment financially. Example; Buying coffee, etc.
